original_text: I only have a few more years to live. I will die and I will never again return to this earth. I only have a few more years to live. I will die and I will never again return to this earth. I only have a few more years to live. I will die and I will never again return to this earth. I only have a few more years to live.
korean_text: 수년이 지나면 나는 돌아오지 못할 길로 갈 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: I only have a few more years to live.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 살 수 있는 몇 년밖에 남지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: and I will never again return to this earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 다시는 이 땅으로 돌아오지 않을 것이다.
